trans-unit.resname: POR·1 | Alabaster Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·1 | Alabaster Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is put into your discard pile from play, shuffle CARDNAME back into your deck.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME从场上被置入弃牌堆中，则将CARDNAME放入牌库中洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·2 | Angelic Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Any one creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 任一个生物得到+3S/+3D并获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.

trans-unit.resname: POR·4 | Ardent Militia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.
Destroy all lands. (This includes your lands.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有的地（包括你自己的地）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·6 | Armored Pegasus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·7 | Blessed Reversal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare interceptors.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣布拦截者之前使用。

trans-unit.resname: POR·7 | Blessed Reversal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: For each attacking creature, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 计算攻击生物数量。每一只攻击生物都会使你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: POR·8 | Blinding Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap all creatures except for white creatures. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 横置所有生物，除了白色生物以外（包括你自己的生物）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·10 | Breath of Life | Card Name
POR·10 | Breath of Life | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Take any one summon creature from your discard pile and put that card into play. Treat it as though you just played it from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 从你的弃牌堆中任意选择一张召唤生物牌，将它放到场上。将这张牌视为刚从你手上进场。

trans-unit.resname: POR·11 | Charging Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME attacks, it gets +0/+3 until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME进行攻击，则它得到+0S/+3D直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: POR·12 | Defiant Stand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare interceptors.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣布拦截者之前使用。

trans-unit.resname: POR·12 | Defiant Stand | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Any one creature gets +1/+3 until the end of the turn. If that creature is tapped, untap it.
trans-unit.target: 任何一只生物得到+1S/+3D直到回合结束。若该生物是已被横置的，则将它重置。

trans-unit.resname: POR·14 | False Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose any one player. That player can't attack on his or her next turn.
trans-unit.target: 任意选择一名玩家，该玩家在他的下一回合中不能进行攻击。

trans-unit.resname: POR·15 | Fleet-Footed Monk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be intercepted by any creature with offense 2 or greater.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被任何攻击力等于或大于2的生物拦截。

trans-unit.resname: POR·17 | Gift of Estates | Card Name
POR·17 | Gift of Estates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If your opponent has more lands in play than you do, search your deck for up to three plains and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 若你的对手拥有的地比你多，则从你的牌库中搜寻至最多三张平原，并将它们放入你的手上。此后，将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·18 | Harsh Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare interceptors.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣布拦截者之前使用。

trans-unit.resname: POR·18 | Harsh Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: This turn, each attacking creature that damages you also deals equal damage to the attacking player.
trans-unit.target: 在本回合中，每只攻击生物对你造成多少伤害，该攻击生物也对你的对手造成相等数量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: POR·19 | Keen-Eyed Archers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can intercept as though it had flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以拦截具有飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·21 | Path of Peace | Card Name
POR·21 | Path of Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature. That creature's owner gains 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭任何一个生物。该生物的拥有者获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: POR·23 | Renewing Dawn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each mountain your opponent has in play, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 你的对手每拥有一张山脉在场，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: POR·24 | Sacred Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be intercepted by black or red creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被黑色或红色的生物拦截。

trans-unit.resname: POR·25 | Sacred Nectar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·26 | Seasoned Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME attacks, you may choose to tap any one creature. (Tapped creatures can't intercept.)
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME进行攻击，则你可以选择任何一只生物并加以横置（被横置的生物不能进行拦截）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·27 | Spiritual Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从你手上进场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: POR·28 | Spotted Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: For each black creature your opponent has in play, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 你的对手每拥有一个黑色生物在场，你便获得3点生命。

trans-unit.note: 简中博图的星辰天使为异画。

trans-unit.resname: POR·30s | Starlit Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.note: 简中博图的星辰天使为异画。

trans-unit.source: All your creatures get +0/+3 until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 你的所有生物得到+0S/+3D直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: POR·32 | Stern Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap CARDNAME to give any one creature +2/+2 until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合中，你宣布攻击之前，你可以横置CARDNAME，以给予任一只生物+2S/+2D直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: POR·33 | Temporary Truce | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two any player draws, that player gains 2 life. (You choose whether to draw first.)
trans-unit.target: 每一个玩家可抓至多两张牌。若有玩家所抓的牌少于两张，则该玩家每少抓一张牌，便可获得2点生命（你先选择是否要抓牌）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·34 | Valorous Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All white creatures get +2/+0 until the end of the turn. (This includes other players' white creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 所有白色生物得到+2S/+0D直到回合结束（包括对方的白色生物）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·35 | Venerable Monk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从你手上进场时，你获得2点生命。
消灭任何一个已被横置的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·37 | Wall of Swords | Card Name
POR·37 | Wall of Swords | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·37 | Wall of Swords | Card Text | Paragraph 2
POR·38 | Warrior's Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All your creatures get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 你的所有生物得到+1S/+1D直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: POR·38† | Warrior's Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All your creatures get +1/+1 until the end of the turn. (For example, a 1/2 creature would become 2/3.)
trans-unit.target: 你的所有生物得到+1S/+1D直到回合结束（例如，一只1S/2D的生物会变成2S/3D）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·39 | Wrath of God | Card Name
POR·39 | Wrath of God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put all creatures into their owners' discard piles. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物放入其拥有者的弃牌堆中（包括你的生物）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·40 | Ancestral Memories | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top seven cards of your deck. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your discard pile.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶上的七张牌。将其中两张放置在你的手上，其余的放置在你的弃牌堆。

trans-unit.resname: POR·41 | Balance of Power | Card Name
POR·41 | Balance of Power | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent does, draw until you have the same number. (When you play CARDNAME, it doesn't count as in your hand.)
trans-unit.target: 若你手上的牌比对手手上的牌还要少，则你抓牌直到两人手上的牌数量相等（当你使用CARDNAME时，它不算是在你的手上）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·42 | Baleful Stare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at your opponent's hand. For each mountain and red card there, you draw a card. (You draw from your deck.)
trans-unit.target: 检视对手手上的牌。计算他手中山脉与红色牌的总数，然后你抓与此数量相等数量的牌（由你的牌库抓取）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·43 | Capricious Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap CARDNAME to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，你进行攻击以前，你可以横置CARDNAME，使它对任何一个生物或是玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: POR·44 | Cloak of Feathers | Card Name
POR·44 | Cloak of Feathers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Any one creature gains flying until the end of the turn. You draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 任何一只生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。\n你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·45 | Cloud Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·45 | Cloud Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can intercept only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能拦截具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·46 | Cloud Pirates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·46 | Cloud Pirates | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can intercept only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能拦截具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·47 | Cloud Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·47 | Cloud Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can intercept only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能拦截具有飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·48 | Command of Unsummoning | Card Name
POR·48 | Command of Unsummoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only after you're attacked, before you declare interceptors.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能在你被攻击后，但还未宣告拦截之前使用。

trans-unit.resname: POR·48 | Command of Unsummoning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return any one or two attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将任何一只或两只攻击生物移回其拥有者手中。

trans-unit.resname: POR·50 | Cruel Fate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your opponent's deck. Put one of them into your opponent's discard pile and the rest on top of his or her deck in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你的对手的牌库顶上五张牌。将这五张牌的其中一张放置于该对手的弃牌堆，再将其余的牌以任意顺序放置于该对手的牌库顶部。

trans-unit.resname: POR·51 | Deep-Sea Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can attack only if the defending player has an island in play.
trans-unit.target: 只有在防御的玩家有海岛在场时，CARDNAME才能攻击。

trans-unit.resname: POR·52 | Djinn of the Lamp | Card Name
POR·52 | Djinn of the Lamp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·53 | Déjà Vu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one sorcery card from your discard pile to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将任何一张放在你的坟墓场中的法术牌，移回到你的手上。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping his or her creatures and lands.
trans-unit.target: 在你的对手的下一回合开始时，他必须略去重置所有地或是生物的行动。

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses and discards from his or her hand any number of cards and then draws that many cards. You then draw a card. (You choose first.)
trans-unit.target: 每一个玩家都可以选择他自己手上任意数量的牌，并将之弃置于弃牌堆中；然后，抓与被他弃掉的牌相等数量的牌。\n在此之后，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·58 | Ingenious Thief | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·58 | Ingenious Thief | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, look at your opponent's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，检视对手手上的牌。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, return any one creature to its owner's hand. (If you're the only one with creatures, return one of them to your hand.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，将任何一只生物移回到其拥有者手上。（若此时只有你有生物在场，则将这些生物的其中一只移回手上。）

trans-unit.resname: POR·60 | Merfolk of the Pearl Trident | Card Name
POR·61 | Mystic Denial | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Play CARDNAME only in response to another player playing a summon creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her discard pile.
trans-unit.target: 你只能在其他的玩家使用召唤生物或是法术时，以反应它的方式使用CARDNAME。被反应的牌将不会产生任何效应，而直接被放进弃牌堆中。

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your deck and return them in any order. You may choose to shuffle your deck. Then draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 检视你的牌库顶上的三张牌，然后以任意顺序将这些牌放回牌库顶上。然后，你可以选择是否要洗牌。最后，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·63 | Owl Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·63 | Owl Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，抓一张牌；然后选择你手上的一张牌，将它弃掉。

trans-unit.resname: POR·64 | Personal Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your deck for a sorcery and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put the revealed card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: 由你的牌库找出一张法术牌，并将此牌交由所有玩家检视。然后，将你的套牌洗牌，并将那一张牌放在牌库的顶端。

trans-unit.resname: POR·65 | Phantom Warrior | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·67 | Snapping Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·68 | Sorcerous Sight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at your opponent's hand. You draw a card. (Draw the card from your deck.)
trans-unit.target: 检视对手手上的牌。你抓一张牌（由你的牌库顶上抓）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·69 | Storm Crow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·70 | Symbol of Unsummoning | Card Name
POR·70 | Symbol of Unsummoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one creature to its owner's hand. You draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将任何一只生物移回到其拥有者手中。你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.
trans-unit.target: 选择任何一位玩家。在该位玩家的下一个回合中，他所有能攻击你的生物都必须攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: POR·72 | Theft of Dreams | Card Name
POR·72 | Theft of Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 计算对手在场的生物中已横置的有几只。你抓与此数量相等数量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: POR·73 | Thing from the Deep | Card Name
POR·73 | Thing from the Deep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME attacks, destroy one of your islands or destroy CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME攻击，则你消灭一张你的海岛，否则消灭CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: POR·74 | Tidal Surge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap any one, two, or three creatures without flying. (Tapped creatures can't intercept.)
trans-unit.target: 横置一只、两只或是三只不具飞行异能的生物（被横置的生物不能用来拦截）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·75 | Time Ebb | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return any one creature to the top of its owner's deck.
trans-unit.target: 将任何一只生物移回其拥有者的牌库顶端。

trans-unit.resname: POR·76 | Touch of Brilliance | Card Name
POR·76 | Touch of Brilliance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·77 | Wind Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·78 | Withering Gaze | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at your opponent's hand. For each forest and green card there, you draw a card. (You draw from your deck.)
trans-unit.target: 检视对手手上的牌。计算他手中树林与绿色牌的总数，然后你抓与此数量相等数量的牌（由你的牌库抓取）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·79 | Arrogant Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·80s | Assassin's Blade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

trans-unit.target: 消灭任何一个攻击中的非黑色生物。

POR·82 | Bog Raiders | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: POR·83 | Bog Wraith | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, CARDNAME can't be intercepted.)
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（若防御玩家在场上拥有任何沼泽，则CARDNAME不能被拦截）

trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME attacks, it gets +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME攻击，则它得到+2S/+0D直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: POR·85 | Craven Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·86 | Cruel Bargain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up. (For example, if you have 11 life, you lose 6 life.)
trans-unit.target: 抓四张牌。你失去生命；失去的生命点数等于你目前生命除以二以后，小数点以下进位的数字（例如：若你有11点生命，则你失去6点生命）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·87 | Cruel Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your deck for any card. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 自你的套牌中寻找任何一张牌。将你的套牌洗牌，然后将那张牌面朝下的放在你的套牌顶端。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: POR·88 | Dread Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This turn, your black creatures can be intercepted only by other black creatures.
trans-unit.target: 在此回合中，你的黑色生物只能被其他黑色生物拦截。

trans-unit.resname: POR·89 | Dread Reaper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·89 | Dread Reaper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you lose 5 life. (The person who plays CARDNAME loses the life.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，你失去5点生命（使用CARDNAME的人失去生命）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·90 | Dry Spell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature and player. (This includes your creatures and you.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每一个生物及玩家造成1点伤害（包括你和你的生物都会受伤）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·91 | Ebon Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·91 | Ebon Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to choose and discard a card from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，你可以强迫你的对手在他自己的手上选一张牌，并将那张牌弃到他的弃牌堆。

trans-unit.resname: POR·92 | Endless Cockroaches | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is put into your discard pile from play, return CARDNAME to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME由场上被放置入你的弃牌堆，则将CARDNAME移回你的手上。

trans-unit.resname: POR·93 | Feral Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
POR·94 | Final Strike | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one of your creatures. CARDNAME deals to your opponent damage equal to that creature's offense. Then, put the creature in your discard pile.
trans-unit.target: 选择一只你的生物。CARDNAME对你的对手造成伤害；此伤害的点数与被选择生物的攻击力点数相等。然后，将这只生物放置入你的弃牌堆。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you may choose to return a summon creature from your discard pile to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，你可以在你的弃牌堆中选择一张召唤生物牌，并将它移回你的手上。

trans-unit.resname: POR·96 | Hand of Death | Card Name
POR·96 | Hand of Death | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature that isn't black. (A creature is black if it has o\nB in its cost.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭任何一只非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.

trans-unit.source: Any one creature gets +4/+0 until the end of the turn.

trans-unit.resname: POR·98 | King's Assassin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap CARDNAME to destroy any one tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 在你的回合中，你攻击以前，你可以横置CARDNAME，以消灭任何一只已经被横置的生物。

trans-unit.resname: POR·99 | Mercenary Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, choose and discard a summon creature from your hand or destroy CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME由你的手上进场时，你从你的手上选择一张召唤生物牌，并将它弃到弃牌堆；否则，消灭CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: POR·100 | Mind Knives | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Your opponent discards a card at random from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 你的对手由他自己的手中乱数的选择一张牌，并将它弃到他的弃牌堆。

trans-unit.resname: POR·101 | Mind Rot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Your opponent chooses and discards two cards from his or her hand. (If your opponent has only one card, he or she discards it.)
trans-unit.target: 你的对手由他自己的手上选择两张牌，并将它们弃掉（若你的对手的手中只有一张牌，则他须将之弃掉）。

trans-unit.resname: POR·103 | Nature's Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all green creatures. (This includes your green creatures.)

trans-unit.resname: POR·104 | Noxious Toad | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is put into your discard pile from play, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

POR·106 | Rain of Tears | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play from your hand, you may choose to destroy any one creature that isn't black.

trans-unit.resname: POR·109 | Serpent Warrior | Card Text | Paragraph 1
